org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.providers
Interface IAeURNStorageProvider

All Superinterfaces:
IAeStorageProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeSQLURNStorageProvider, AeXMLDBURNStorageProvider
public interface IAeURNStorageProvider
extends IAeStorageProvider

A URN storage delegate. This interface defines methods that the delegating URN storage will call in order to store/read date in the underlying database.

Method Summary
